description:
- Added toms, fixed rhythm in some places (pre-chorus, final chorus etc). Should sound way more accurate & closer to the drums on the album now
- Changed the finger positions for Kirk's intro part

For some reason, exporting to GP5 changes the first instrument of the tab, it's why Hetfield's vocals are on bass now lol
title: That Was Just Your Life
